[观]
Simplified from 觀 ( 雚 → 又 and 見 → 见 ). Same simplification of phonetic occurs in 权 .

[觀]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *koːn, *koːns ): phonetic 雚 ( OC *koːns ) + semantic 見 ( “ see ” ) .

[観]
Variant of 觀 . Simplified from 觀 ( 雚 → 𮥶 ). Compare 権 .
The modern Japanese usage is of reform ( shinjitai ) nature.
